shapes3d.utils

Class UV

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes3d.utils.UV

  • public class UV
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class to hold texture coordinates.
    Only used by Cone class and Mesh2DCoreWithCaps.EndCap classes to hold 'circular' coordinates on a rectangular image.
    Author:
    Peter Lager
